item.title: Monarch 完成 47 亿美元机会型信贷基金募集
item.description: 专门从事不良债务的资产管理公司 Monarch Alternative Capital 表示，该公司完成了 47 亿美元的机会主义信贷基金，超过了 35 亿美元的目标。【原文：Monarch Alternative Capital, an asset manager specializing in distressed debt, said it closed a $4.7 billion opportunistic credit fund, exceeding its target of $3.5 billion.】

item.title: 三星全球裁员数千人
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，作为全球裁员数千人计划的一部分，三星电子公司正在东南亚、澳大利亚和新西兰裁员。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is laying off workers in Southeast Asia, Australia and New Zealand as part of a plan to reduce global headcount by thousands of jobs, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 美联储库克认为人工智能可提高生产力，但具体程度尚不明确
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）表示，她预计人工智能将推动生产率增长，但她认为这一预测存在 "很大的 "不确定性。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said she anticipates artificial intelligence will drive a pickup in productivity growth, but sees “substantial” uncertainty around her forecast.】

item.title: 荷兰银行部长称无需提高薪酬即可找到新首席执行官
item.description: 荷兰财政部长表示，荷兰银行应该能够找到一位优秀的首席执行官继任者，而无需提供更高的报酬。【原文：ABN Amro Bank NV should to be able to find a good replacement for its chief executive without having to offer a higher compensation, according to the Netherlands’ finance minister.】

item.title: 欧佩克 9 月原油产量因利比亚中断而大幅下降
item.description: 在利比亚政治危机导致供应减少之后，欧佩克的原油产量在上个月急剧下降。【原文：OPEC’s crude production declined sharply last month after a political crisis slashed supplies from Libya.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚大学是最新涉足小额债券市场的常春藤盟校
item.description: 哥伦比亚大学预计将向投资者借贷 5 亿美元债务，加入今年在资本市场发债的名校行列。【原文：Columbia University is expected to tap investors to borrow $500 million of debt, joining a boom of elite colleges that have issued in the capital markets this year.】

item.title: 拉塔姆航空公司将出售破产退出后的首笔美元债券
item.description: 拉塔姆航空集团（Latam Airlines Group SA）自摆脱破产保护以来首次进入全球债务市场。【原文：Latam Airlines Group SA is tapping global debt markets for the first time since the carrier emerged from its Chapter 11 bankruptcy.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称赞预算紧缩，赞比亚债券反弹
item.description: 赞比亚的 2025 年支出计划赢得了摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的赞誉，尽管该计划引起了正在与该国百年来最严重干旱的影响作斗争的当地人的担忧，但赞比亚的美元债券还是攀升了。【原文：Zambia’s dollar bonds climbed after its 2025 spending plan won praise from Morgan Stanley even as it drew concern from locals battling with the impact of the nation’s worst drought in a century.】

item.title: 美国职位空缺攀升至三个月高点，超出预期
item.description: 美国 8 月份的职位空缺上升至三个月来的最高点，这与其他数据显示的工人需求放缓的情况不符。【原文：US job openings rose in August to a three-month high, a development at odds with other data indicating slowing demand for workers.】

item.title: 英国称俄罗斯勒索软件黑客与克里姆林宫间谍合作
item.description: 据英国国家犯罪署称，一个俄罗斯犯罪团伙奉克里姆林宫情报部门的命令，秘密对北约盟国进行网络攻击和间谍活动。【原文：A Russian criminal gang secretly conducted cyberattacks and espionage operations against NATO allies on the orders of the Kremlin’s intelligence services, according to the UK’s National Crime Agency.】

item.title: 微软为消费者人工智能助理增加语音和视觉功能
item.description:
最新版本的 Copilot 应用程序将适用于 iOS、Android、Windows 和 WhatsApp。【原文：

The latest version of the Copilot app will work with iOS, Android, Windows  and WhatsApp.

】

item.title: 前对冲基金交易员成立组织以消除政治分歧
item.description: 对冲基金 Citadel 固定收益交易部前全球主管德里克-考夫曼（Derek Kaufman）正在发起一项努力，试图突破美国政治的分歧。【原文：Derek Kaufman, a former global head of fixed-income trading at hedge fund Citadel, is starting an effort to try to break through the divisiveness in US politics.】

item.title: 德国两年期收益率自 2022 年以来首次跌至 2% 以下
item.description: 德国债券跳涨，使短期收益率近两年来首次跌破 2%，原因是地缘政治担忧引发了对避险资产的广泛追捧。【原文：German bonds jumped, sending short-term yields below 2% for the first time in almost two years amid a broad rush for haven assets on geopolitical concerns.】

item.title: Unieuro 创始人反对 Fnac 收购，理由是价值被严重低估
item.description: Unieuro SpA 的创始人反对 Fnac Darty SA 的出价，理由是该出价大大低估了这家意大利电子产品零售商的价值。【原文：The founders of Unieuro SpA are opposing a bid from Fnac Darty SA on the grounds that it significantly undervalues the Italian electronics retailer.】

item.title: 二叠纪天然气开始通过得克萨斯州的马特宏管道输送
item.description: Matterhorn Express 管道已开始向威廉姆斯公司（Williams Cos.【原文：Matterhorn Express Pipeline has begun transporting natural gas into Williams Cos.’s Transco pipeline, a long-awaited addition to midstream infrastructure serving the Permian Basin.】

item.title: 沙特矿业部长认为在加拿大进行交易没有障碍
item.description: 尽管政府规定限制国有外国实体的投资，但沙特阿拉伯矿业部长认为没有任何障碍阻止沙特王国与加拿大矿业部门进行交易。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s mining minister doesn’t see any barriers preventing dealmaking by the Kingdom into Canada’s mining sector, despite government rules restricting investments from state-owned foreign entities.】

item.title: 江森自控启动价值 20 亿美元的 ADT 警报器出售交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，江森自控国际公司正在启动 ADT 报警器业务的出售程序，该业务的交易价值约为 20 亿美元。【原文：Johnson Controls International Plc is kicking off the sale process of its ADT alarms business, which could be worth about $2 billion in a deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: LME关键价差再次飙升，铝挤压效应持续蔓延
item.description: 铝市场的压力继续增大，伦敦金属交易所 10 月份交割的合约比 11 月份的溢价更高，这表明铝市场受到的挤压越来越大。【原文：Pressure in the aluminum market continues to build, as contracts for October delivery on the London Metal Exchange trade at an even higher premium over November in a sign of a mounting squeeze.】

item.title: 爱尔兰发布公司税优惠赠款预算案
item.description: 爱尔兰政府公布了 2025 年的丰厚预算，向选民提供了多项优惠，这要归功于创纪录的公司税收入预测和苹果公司补缴税款带来的丰厚财政收入。【原文：Ireland’s government has delivered a bonanza budget for 2025, handing voters several giveaways, thanks to flush coffers boosted by forecast record corporation tax receipts and Apple Inc back taxes.】

item.title: Northvolt 支持者向电池公司 Polarium 投资 4900 万美元
item.description: 电池存储公司 Polarium Energy Solutions AB 在新一轮融资中筹集了 5 亿瑞典克朗（合 4,900 万美元）的资金，该轮融资得到了持有陷入困境的电池制造商 Northvolt AB 股份的投资者的支持。【原文：Battery-storage company Polarium Energy Solutions AB raised 500 million Swedish kronor ($49 million) in a fresh funding round backed by investors with stakes in beleaguered battery maker Northvolt AB.】

item.title: 印度采取措施遏制股票衍生品交易热潮
item.description: 印度证券监管机构周二通报了限制该国股票衍生品交易激增的措施，因为越来越多的散户参与其中，使投机性押注达到了世界最高水平。【原文：India’s securities regulator on Tuesday notified steps to limit a surge in equity derivatives trading in the nation after growing retail participation took the speculative bets to the highest in the world.】

item.title: Intesa 股票大涨后成为欧盟最大的上市贷款机构
item.description: Intesa Sanpaolo SpA 银行今年股价大涨，首次超过桑坦德银行，成为欧盟市值最大的银行。【原文：Intesa Sanpaolo SpA became the European Union’s largest lender by market value for the first time, overtaking Banco Santander SA after a surge in the Italian bank’s share price this year.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官称欧盟需要更大的银行，并将目光投向德国商业银行
item.description: UniCredit SpA 首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 正在寻求收购德国竞争对手 Commerzbank AG。【原文：UniCredit SpA Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel, who’s pursuing a potential takeover of German rival Commerzbank AG, said Europe’s banks aren’t large enough to cover the bloc’s funding needs.】

item.title: 石油巨头重启与哈萨克斯坦政府就 50 亿美元卡沙甘硫磺罚款的谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，卡沙干巨型油田的合作伙伴已重启与哈萨克斯坦当局的谈判，旨在解决潜在的 50 亿美元环境罚款问题。【原文：Partners in the giant Kashagan oil field have restarted talks with the Kazakh authorities aimed at settling a potential $5 billion environmental fine, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国融资市场波动助推 SOFR 主要基准指数飙升
item.description: 作为美国金融体系基础的一个关键利率在 9 月底大幅跳升，这表明围绕本季度末的波动已经卷土重来。【原文：A key rate underlying the US financial system jumped sharply at the end of September, an indication that volatility surrounding the end of the quarter has returned.】

item.title: 台风 "克利斯朵夫 "关闭了台湾价值 2.5 万亿美元的股票市场
item.description: 超强台风克拉森带着强风和暴雨逼近台湾，台湾将关闭 2.5 万亿美元的股票市场。【原文：Taiwan will close its $2.5 trillion stock market as Super Typhoon Krathon approaches the island with strong winds and heavy rain.】

item.title: Moove 将以 4.38 亿美元在美国上市结束巴西 IPO 荒
item.description: 企业集团 Cosan SA 旗下的 Moove Lubricants Holdings 及其股东正寻求在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中筹集高达 4.38 亿美元的资金，这将结束巴西公司长达三年的上市荒。【原文：Moove Lubricants Holdings, a unit of conglomerate Cosan SA, and its shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $438 million in a US IPO that’s set to end a three-year listing drought for Brazilian companies.】

item.title: 俄罗斯钢铁业亿万富翁涉足广受欢迎的婴儿食品
item.description: 亿万富翁弗拉基米尔-利辛（Vladimir Lisin）是俄罗斯最大钢铁公司的所有者，他已同意收购一家婴儿食品生产商，该公司在当地与百事公司（PepsiCo Inc.【原文：Billionaire Vladimir Lisin, the owner of Russia’s biggest steel company, has agreed to purchase a baby-food producer that competes locally with PepsiCo Inc., diversifying his business portfolio inside the country.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司价值 13 亿美元的股份销售据称将于下周启动
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的旗舰公司计划最早于下周推出股票出售计划，这标志着该公司在 2023 年的一份尖锐的做空报告破坏了之前的计划之后，重返公开股票市场。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s flagship firm plans to roll out its share sale as early as next week, according to people familiar, marking its return to public equity markets after a scathing short-seller report in 2023 derailed a previous plan.】

item.title: Blackstone 主导防盗技术制造商的私人信贷交易
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 为 Graham Partners Inc. 的 Gatekeeper Systems 提供了 5.5 亿美元的私人信贷交易，该公司生产用于检测盗窃行为的购物车技术。【原文：Blackstone Inc. provided a $550 million private credit deal for Graham Partners Inc.’s Gatekeeper Systems, which makes technology for shopping carts designed to detect theft, according to a person familiar with the matter.】
